title: Replace corrupted resume PDF with the newly attached valid PDF at the same public URL

requirements.summary: Replace the existing public resume PDF file with the newly attached PDF while keeping the exact same URL used by the Hero section.
acceptanceCriteria: The file at "frontend/public/assets/resume/riya-tyagi-resume.pdf" is replaced with the newly attached PDF (byte-for-byte updated in the build output).
Clicking the "Download Resume" button in the Hero section downloads/opens "/assets/resume/riya-tyagi-resume.pdf" without any 'invalid PDF' error in common browser PDF viewers.
Opening the downloaded PDF in a desktop PDF reader (e.g., Adobe Reader/Preview) succeeds without corruption warnings.

file_operations.description: Overwrite/replace this static asset with the newly user-attached PDF (use the provided attachment file as the source) while keeping the exact filename and location so the public URL remains "/assets/resume/riya-tyagi-resume.pdf".
